meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7478.

td.p: Joe Friedman, a family medical physician from Charlotte, North Carolina
Kate Edwards, a tech startup founder from Venice, California
Rob Liguori, a research editor from Brooklyn, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $19,601)

tr.td: TAKE ME OUT TO THE CLASSICAL MUSIC GAME
HEALTH & MEDICINE
CLICHES
A SMALL COLLEGE
OBJECTS
STANDUP, SITCOM

')

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_5', 'clue_J_2_5_stuck', '(Sarah of the Clue Crew shows an anatomical animation on the monitor.) An arrhythmia is any abnormal heart rhythm; when it\'s too slow, less than 60 beats per minute, it\'s called bradycardia; when it\'s too fast, more than 100 beats per minute, it\'s called this, from the Greek for "swift" & "heart"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Sarah of the Clue Crew shows an anatomical animation on the monitor.) An arrhythmia is any abnormal heart rhythm; when it's too slow, less than 60 beats per minute, it's called bradycardia; when it's too fast, more than 100 beats per minute, it's called this, from the Greek for "swift" & "heart"

tr.td: Rob
Kate
Joe

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Rob
Kate
Joe
THE FRUITS OF LABOR
LITERARY TITLE CHARACTERS
THE GREAT DEPRESSION
COLOR THAT FLAG!
SPORTS CARS?
PLUS "C"
(Alex: Each response is two words--one with a C, one without a C.)
